contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 28, 1993 D Wensleydale International Festival
Wensleydale International Festival 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
wensleydale-international-festival
None
March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points)
Aysgarth, North Yorkshire, England, UK Edinburgh International contest was not run and the competitors (5 Scottish and 4 English bands) played at Wensleydale instead. Each band also had to play a solo item. Best march - Ever Ready (Ravenswood) Best hymn - Whitburn (Crimond) Best test piece - Yorkshire Imperial. Best soloist - Martin Gill (Eb Bass) Yorkshire Imperial.(Czardas -Monti). Best soloist in test piece - Jason Moore (cornet) Yorkshire Imperial. Best percussion - Whitburn. 9 bands competed.
Feb. 24, 2015, 11:09 a.m. Feb. 24, 2015, 11:29 a.m.
1 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band Alan Exley English Heritage
